channel.title: News & Announcements
channel.description: Find out about the latest information about Pixel Exit and it's products in here.

item.title: Happy Thanksgiving!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Steve)
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.content:encoded:
Just wanted to say Happy Thanksgiving to all who celebrate it!

Also support for today will likely be limited, if we happen to get on and can solve a problem quickly we will but today will be spent with our families.

Enjoy!

item.title: Status Update
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone!

Just wanted to do a little check in as it has been awhile since our last news post. Here's a little snippet of what we've been up to:

  • XenBase 1.5.x Not entirely sure what we'll label this as but the release is coming out nice. We're making sure we do extra testing with various setups as it has come to my attention that we can be doing things better than we have on some of our properties.
  • Two new styles which we're looking at showcasing shortly after the next...

Status Update

item.title: Server Upgrade - PHP ect..
item.author: invalid@example.com (Steve)
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.content:encoded:
Today @MattW updated our server that runs Pixel Exit to run the latest PHP 7 version, along with a couple other things. A couple hiccups here and there but they were solved quickly by Matt and @Russ.

If you happen to notice any oddities do let us know!

item.title: 1.5.11 Style Updates
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone, we're pushing our 1.5.11 updates out today. Once you receive the email you'll be able to download it immediately with an active license via your licenses area.

See this post for potentially common problems after upgrading

YOU MUST BE ON XENFORO 1.5.11 PRIOR TO UPGRADING/INSTALLING...

1.5.11 Style Updates

item.title: 1.5.9 Style Updates
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone, we're pushing our 1.5.9 updates out today. Once you receive the email you'll be able to download it immediately with an active license via your licenses area.

YOU MUST BE ON XENFORO 1.5.9 PRIOR TO UPGRADING/INSTALLING THIS

This is considered a rather large update, I would personally recommend installing it as a brand new style. This is just to make sure you're up...

1.5.9 Style Updates

item.title: 1.5.7 Style Updates
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone, we're currently pushing out our 1.5.7 updates. Once you receive the email you'll be able to download it immediately with an active license via your licenses area.

Before upgrading please make sure to take backups of your styles (XenBase, Purchased Style, and any child styles) before attempting updates. It is recommended to do some test imports so you can see what is affected!...

1.5.7 Style Updates

item.title: 1.5.6 Updates
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone, we'll be pushing out our 1.5.6 updates over the course of today. Once you receive the email you'll be able to download it immediately with an active license via your licenses area. We consider this a rather large update so please see the key notes towards the bottom of the post.

Additionally located at the bottom of the post are the change-logs some of the styles. If it doesn't contain a change-log than it was...

1.5.6 Updates

item.title: Happy Holidays from Pixel Exit
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
Hello I hope everyone enjoys their Holidays this season. We'll be taking a few days to spend time with our families and friends so our support will be limited. We hope you make the most of this time of year and enjoy a well deserved break!

Before we go we want to thank everyone for an awesome 2015. The support from our customers has been tremendous and we've grown so much since 2014 thanks to all of you.

Be safe and have fun, we'll see everyone soon enough!

item.title: Small Pixel Exit Forum changes
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
Just as a heads up we've changed the setup of our forums slightly to hopefully make things a little more user friendly.

New Forum:
In the past we've been asked where clients can post their reviews about us and we typically directed them to a thread I started a few years ago on XenForo. Now if you have just a little bit of time and want to give us a small review you may do so in the new Testimonials area.

Changes:...

Small Pixel Exit Forum changes

item.title: Back Online
item.author: invalid@example.com (Steve)
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.content:encoded:
We're back!

Sorry for the inconvenience, we had a billing issue which in the end was entirely my fault that led to the downtime today. Things are rectified and hope no future downtime happens!

item.title: 1.5.3 Style Updates & XenBase Improvements
item.author: invalid@example.com (Steve)
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone, just to let you know we are in the process of updating the styles in the store. Here is a list of the changes. Most changes were on XenBase only. The improvements and bug fixes trickle down to all styles.

Note* Frag Zone will be the last style updated as it had some fundamental changes to the navigation in XenBase. Just making sure we get the proper things in place before turning it loose.

Before upgrading please make sure to take backups of your styles...

1.5.3 Style Updates & XenBase Improvements

item.title: Temporarily limiting TeamSpeak 3 Integration Sales
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
Starting today, we will be limiting sales of the TeamSpeak 3 Integration add-on. While many customers are successfully able to establish connections between XenForo and TeamSpeak, the variance in TeamSpeak server configurations is causing problems for a handful of customers. While dedicated TeamSpeak servers are generally working great, the issues mostly stem from rented servers and the different ways providers have configured these.

As such, we don't feel it's right to have it out there...

Temporarily limiting TeamSpeak 3 Integration Sales

item.title: 1.5.1 Updates and some future plans
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
Today we'll be sending out 1.5.1 style updates to those with active licenses. This brings XenBase up-to-date with XenForo 1.5.1, addresses a few issues with the recently introduced Off-Canvas Menu along with some other minor bug fixes.

See the change-log and information about the Off-Canvas Menu improvements in the post below.

What are our plans here at Pixel Exit?

New Site
Over the past couple months we've been working on a brand new style for Pixel...

1.5.1 Updates and some future plans

item.title: Black Friday - Cyber Monday Sale
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
Thank you this promotion has ended.

- Russ

item.title: Regarding 1.5.2 (Security Fix) - Style Updates
item.author: invalid@example.com (Russ)
item.dc:creator: Russ
item.content:encoded:
XenForo released 1.5.2 today which includes a security fix which you can find more about here. Just so everyone knows our 1.5.1 works perfectly fine on 1.5.2 with no outdated templates so we encourage you to upgrade XenForo as soon as you can.

We've been working on 1.5.2 version of XenBase since 1.5.1, here's a quick preview:
  • Floating sidebar completely re-coded, now works with...

Regarding 1.5.2 (Security Fix) - Style Updates
